article_title: New York Spot Natural-Gas Prices Jump
article_text:
Natural-gas prices surged to all-time highs on the East Coast on Monday as frigid weather approached, raising the prospect of higher prices nationwide in coming weeks.

Natural gas for Tuesday delivery rose as high as $90 a million British thermal units at a pipeline delivery point in New Jersey where New York City gas prices are set, according to...

twitter.description: The price of natural gas delivered to New York City and mid-Atlantic states soared Monday to all-time highs as unusually frigid weather approached.
twitter.creator: @nicolefriedman

image.alt: The price of natural gas delivered to New York City and mid-Atlantic states rises to record.

twitter.title: New York Spot Natural-Gas Prices Rise to Record as Cold Approaches
